forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later at night. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
